item.title: Kennedy Center to be renamed 'Trump-Kennedy Center,' White House says

item.title: Congressional stock trading ban bill to get a vote in new year, House Republicans say

item.title: House passes bill to ease permits for building out AI infrastructure
item.description: The SPEED Act now heads to the Senate, which is in the early stages of its own permitting reform talks.

item.title: Trump announces 'warrior dividend' of $1,776 to every U.S. soldier in prime-time speech
item.description: Trump highlighted his administration's efforts to seal the southern border, bring down costs and strengthen U.S. foreign policy.
